title: 820 3332 runs off charger but not battery
message:
820 3332 runs off charger but not battery. Greenlight on MagSafe

PP3V42  3.396v
PPBUS G3H 12.68v running on MagSafe
PPBUS G3H 10.78v running on batt
PPBUS G3H 10.93v running on MagSafe and batt
PPVBATT G3 CONN 10.76v
SMC BC ACOK 3.25v
CHGR ACIN 4.80v
PP18V5 DCIN CONN R 20.15v
PPBUS G3H R 12.67v running on MagSafe
PPVIN G3H P3V42G3H 19.93v

R6905 9.9ohm
R6920 47.5ohm

title: 820 3332 runs off charger but not battery
message: Is the battery recognized in the OS?

title: 820 3332 runs off charger but not battery
message: Yes, and gives charging lighting bolt when connected to magsafe

title: 820 3332 runs off charger but not battery
message: 12.68 volts on PPBUS seems a little high. Any history on this liquid random drop etc?

title: 820 3332 runs off charger but not battery
message: No liquid as far as I can tell, dont know of any drops, no major damage on casing

title: 820 3332 runs off charger but not battery
message: Does it shut off immediately when AC disconnected? If yes then check if 3V42 is present on only battery.

title: 820 3332 runs off charger but not battery
message: 3v42 is 3.39v with battery only. I should have mentioned that this is in internment issuse, but when it is occurring, yes, the machine shuts right down when magsafe is disconnected.

title: 820 3332 runs off charger but not battery
message: Intermittent.....right, have you done the common U8900 reflow?

title: 820 3332 runs off charger but not battery
message: Not on this machine, did not know u8900 could cause a thud type of issuse, but i will definitely give it a shot.
